div.p: The simulated trend of global surface temperature. ( a) Linear trend (K/year) of global surface temperature for the period 1955â€“2005 from GISTEMP. ( b, c) are the same as ( a), but from E7 and E8, respectively. ( d) The difference between ( c, b). Dots denote significance at the 99% confidence level, according to Mann-Kendall trend significance test.
